title: Fruit 66
sectionheader: A brand-new blend of crazy, fast-paced cooking and driving chaos!
sectionembed: <iframe style="position:absolute;top:0;left:0;bottom:0;right:0;width:100%;height:100%;" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ir--O8ZANIc" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
sectiondesc: You're at the helm of a shiny new smoothie-slinging food truck on the wild and scenic Route 66, with a strong desire to fund your dream and expand your business of on-the-road smoothie delivery. Staffing's a little tight these days, so you'll be in charge of cooking, driving, and delivering to customers on the road at breakneck speeds. Will you and your smoothie empire keep up?
ctaafter: and follow us for more updates â¤µ
